title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message
description: When there is no data available for a series, the application should display a friendly error message to inform the user.
OB: When there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the page displaying the series.
3. Observe if there is any data available for the series.
4. If there is no data, check if a friendly error message is displayed.
